attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that Marvin should have this day as his own for all he represented and all he gave.
For the passion, love, sex, inhumanity, injustice, madness, sadness, ego, humility and funkiness he not only sang about but lived.
He's the perfect example of a flawed, beautiful, eloquently elegant human there is.
It was the day he died and the day before his birthday please make it Marvin Gaye day.
I'm not even asking it be made a holiday, just recognise it!

This is not intended to be humorous and what it has to do with government policy is that the government has the ability and the power to create a national holiday.

If you reject again on the grounds you just gave I shall consider it discriminatory, thankyou

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
